author: Lee Weaver
comment: Brilliant puzzle/maze game with full features. Has one annoying bug though....sometimes when you swipe in a direction to move it interferes with wears op and exits the game. Needs option to tap screen edges to move in that direction. Biggest puzzle is why is there an rpg world going on in all the backgrounds? Is this a fund raiser for something bigger?

reply.author: Curved Cat Games
reply.content: Thank you, by default you can also simply tap (see the arrow(s) being displayed around the character showing you the possible direction) around the character. The RPG world in the background is just here to be contemplated. It's not a fund raiser for something bigger.

title: AQ STUDIO=depth and love in their wear games.

author: Mark Upcraft
comment: Love the work that went into this game and the port. It's a stunning little game on my watch. One thing, is Easy Level 12 possible or is there a bug? Can't figure it out.

reply.author: Curved Cat Games
reply.content: Thank you Mark. No bug on Easy level 12, here is the solution: RIGHT UP UP RIGHT DOWN LEFT UP LEFT LEFT DOWN

title: Great port

author: Adrian Paul
comment: An excellent game, very impressed. The swipe controls don't appear to work 100% of the time, but the tap ones do. Love the graphics, and the stuff going on in the background.

author: Mark Bailey
comment: Works well on wear, simple style and gameplay, only thing I'd like to see (if possible) would be some way to save progress between switching phones or factory resets... instead of starting over from zilch each time.
title: Nice!

author: Brion Fallon
comment: As far as the selection goes for Wear this is good.  In reality, its glitchy and recycles rpg maker skins.  Moto 360 with s4.
title: Meh...

author: Declan Smith
comment: Best use of Android Wear for gaming I've seen yet.
title: Brilliant

author: John Sidarovich
comment: Next game hands down for Android wear

author: Nathan Carter
comment: Oh my this game is addicting and will keep you up to the early hours :)

author: Joshua Carson
comment: Lots of fun on the moto 360

author: Benoît `BoD` Lubek
comment: This game is addictive and its quick and fun gameplay makes it perfect for the watch. A real pleasure!
title: Perfect!

author: Nicolas Pomepuy
comment: Nice and addictive game which is perfectly integrated on Android Wear.
title: Perfectly designed for Wear

author: Michael Arnold
comment: I love this more than castlewear so excited this looks amazing.
title: Omgsh
